data.actual_result: The box is slightly smaller than the name and part of the username breaks through the ceiling and the floor.
data.expected_result: The box appearing in the input field containing the username should fully enclose the words.
data.short_description: Long Japanese usernames break out of username container in DM invite input field.
data.steps_to_repro: - Type in a friend with a name like 32x あ. - Select the friend. Make sure the friend name occupies two lines.
